title: Poster, 2010-21-13, 1989
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description:
A white background is divided in four by irregular yellow, red, magenta, and blue rectangular shapes. At the center is a triangular burst of black and white text "A / TA / ME!" flanked by schematic black arms, all interlaced with a jagged red ribbon. 
At upper left is the inscription: "EL DESEO S.A. / PRESENTA / UN FILM DE / ALMODOVAR". At bottom, run the credits: "VICTORIA ABRIL - ANTONIO BANDERAS - LOLES LEON", continuing to the end of the page in increasingly smaller type.
